mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bs_menu ( menu_id, menu_name, menu_path, parent_menu_id, menu_order, menu_icon, use_yn, reg_id, reg_dt) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{parentMenuId}, #{menuOrder}, #{menuIcon}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_order, menu_icon, menu_type, enabled, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM bs_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.update: UPDATE bs_menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_path = #{menuPath}, parent_menu_id = #{parentMenuId}, menu_order = #{menuOrder}, menu_icon = #{menuIcon}, use_yn = #{useYn}, upd_id = #{updId}, upd_dt = NOW() WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select:
SELECT menu_id AS menuId, menu_name AS menuName, menu_path AS menuPath, parent_menu_id AS parentMenuId, menu_order AS menuOrder, menu_icon AS menuIcon, use_yn AS useYn, reg_id AS regId, reg_dt AS regDt, upd_id AS updId, upd_dt AS updDt FROM bs_menu WHERE 1=1
AND menu_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param_value}, '%')
